subject: Prudential Center (Newark)
Lockouts
Labor and Jobs
Stadiums and Arenas
Basketball
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. lockout and the absence of games in cities like Newark has had an impact on people who depend on events at Prudential Center to supplement their income.
snippet: The N.B.A. lockout and the absence of games in cities like Newark has had an impact on people who depend on events at Prudential Center to supplement their income.
